document_data.name: Sythrilia
document_data.mainbody:
'''Sythrilia''' was a famous heroine of ancient [[Thindol]]. She was responsible for freeing her people from the domination of the [[yuan-ti]].{{Cite web/Class Chronicles: Psionics Across the Land}}<ref group="note">In its history of Thindol, ''[[Serpent Kingdoms]]'' presents two periods of yuan-ti domination over Thindol: an overt rule ended in [[293 DR]] and a covert influence ended in [[605 DR]]. It is unknown which Sythrilia was involved in.

The [[Hills of Sythrilia]] in Thindol were named for her by the 1370s DR.
